channel.title: Brisket on My Digital Site using Hugo & Github Pages

item.title: Using a Weber Kettle to Cook a Great Smoked Brisket!
item.description: Want to cook a great smoked brisket but don’t want to invest in an expensive smoker or the 8 to 12 hours it takes to cook a brisket in a smoker? This article describes how to cook a great smoked brisket in 3 and 1/2 hours using a Weber Kettle and your oven.
